name: Spirit Dungeon (EyadTheDeveloper)
description:
You were but a simple wizard minding your business, when these mystical creatures cursed your wand, The curse gives the creatures power whenever you use the wand

So you decide to go into their stronghold to fight the biggest spirits, the king and queen, powerful creatures that no wizard had ever managed to defeat

The game was made for the BTP game jam in 7 days, the theme is "less is more",  the game perfectly fits the theme because as you use your wand to attack the enemies, the enemies get stronger

Controls:- Left mouse click- Attack, you can't hold down and must click, unless your mouse has an autoclicker like mine :)

                       Right mouse click - Interact/purchase items from the store room than you                           can sometimes come by

                       WASD:- movement, you can move in any direction

                       ESC:- Used in leaving a run, turning off basics panel, and going back to main                         menu after finishing the game

All of the audio, music, art and scripts were made by me, feel free to use them if you want, I am not sure why you would want that god awful music tho
